page.title: 16Village Life (cont.)
page.content: {4.Youth Club.} This is run by Malcom Coxall.The age group is 11-16 but older people go.There are sponsored activities which earns money for the club.There is a pool and snooker table,dart board,TV,table tennis and a football table which costs 10p.In the summer we go out and play football and baseball. {5.The Football Club.} Football first started in Castle about 60 years ago.Football is always played on the recreation ground. Football practices are on Wednesday evenings under lights and games are played Saturdays from September to May .Teams play in Cambs. and Halstead leagues. {6.Cricket. Cricket is played by a number of men but it is based in Ashdon village.
